title: Idk why banned

replies.body:
Actually, for the first time ever, i dont know why that warranted a ban either..

Looks a bit annoying out of context (context does not matter to le banhammer), but not worthy of a ban.
I think you missed the 3 uses of a homophobic slur.
You didn't notice the 3 seperate times he through out %%%got?

To clarify the comments other people are making: **Riot has a zero tolerance policy on hate speech**.

>Bionic Jellyfish: %%%gots

^^ This is a homophobic slur, which qualifies as hate speech. Riot's policy is that the first offense is a 14-day ban, which puts your account one punishment away from a permanent ban.
Can you pin this or something? The top post is one with three comments that the original commenter said "I don't understand this either" - this post is much more helpful.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VnRhQIk6,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-06-23T23:51:08.872+0000)
>
> Can you pin this or something? The top post is one with three comments that the original commenter said "I don't understand this either" - this post is much more helpful.

I am not able to, no. My moderator powers are only active on the subboards I actively moderate. I just help out here on PB like any other player. :)

You could have used literally anything else, why the homophobic slur?

Any safeword would work, could have been "pineapple" like in Trainwreck.
Were there any other chatlogs? Usually they give logs for three games worth. For this log, I'd assume it has to do with their no tolerance policy on hate speech, which "%%%gots" is considered.

btw there were no other chatlogs. and i almost never actually use the word described.
Edit: this has been the first time in at least four dozen games i used the word
